headline: Alphawave IP downgraded to Hold from Buy at Jefferies
summary: Jefferies downgraded Alphawave IP (AWEVF) to Hold from Buy with a price target of 183 GBp, up from 160 GBp. The firm notes it had upgraded Alphawave to a Buy on April 3, when Qualcomm (QCOM) first confirmed that it was considering making an offer. Qualcomm’s subsequent cash offer of 183 GBp per share has driven shares to 173 GBp currently, notes the analyst, who reduced the firm’s rating given the market has “largely priced in the cash/share offer.” Published first on TheFly – the ultimate sourc

headline: Silicon Motion's UFS Solution Completes Compatibility Validation with Qualcomm® Snapdragon® Cockpit SA8295P Platform
summary: Silicon Motion Technology Corporation (NasdaqGS: SIMO) ("Silicon Motion"), a global leader in the design and marketing of NAND flash controllers for solid-state storage devices, is pleased to announce that its Universal Flash Storage (UFS) solution has successfully completed compatibility validation on Qualcomm® Snapdragon® Cockpit SA8295P Platform. This achievement enables automotive customers to confidently adopt Silicon Motion's UFS solution with the Snapdragon® Cockpit SA8295P designs.
